meanings.definition: A sexually transmitted infection caused by the bacterium Neisseria gonorrhoeae.
meanings.sent1: Gonorrhoea can be transmitted through unprotected sexual contact.
meanings.sent2: She was diagnosed with gonorrhoea after her routine check-up.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that gonorrhoea was like a sneaky intruder in the body.
meanings.sent4: The spread of gonorrhoea in the community was like a wildfire.
meanings.sent5: Learning about gonorrhoea made him more cautious about his sexual health.

meanings.definition: The discharge or pus-like fluid associated with gonorrhoea.
meanings.sent1: The presence of gonorrhoea discharge indicated an infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the gonorrhoea discharge.
meanings.sent3: The gonorrhoea discharge looked like a tiny waterfall, according to the nurse.
meanings.sent4: The room smelled of sickness and gonorrhoea discharge.
meanings.sent5: The sight of gonorrhoea discharge made her stomach turn.
